text: Bachelor in Paradise is an American reality dating competition television series created for ABC. It is hosted by Chris Harrison and is a spin-off of The Bachelor and The Bachelorette. The series is produced by Next Entertainment in association with Warner Horizon Television, and features previous contestants from The Bachelor and The Bachelorette isolated in a romantic paradise in an exotic tropical destination competing to find their true loves. On February 5, 2019, ABC renewed the series for a sixth season, which premiered on August 5, 2019. On August 5, 2019, ABC renewed the series for a seventh season, that was originally set to air in 2020, but it was postponed to 2021 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. {|id="toc" class="toc" summary="Contents" |- | __NOTOC__ |} ==Series overview== ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2014)=== ===Season 2 (2015)=== ===Season 3 (2016)=== ===Season 4 (2017)=== ===Season 5 (2018)=== ===Season 6 (2019)=== ==References== ==External links== * * Category:The Bachelor (franchise) Category:Lists of American reality television series episodes
